name: Gameboy Advance Custom Reissue
description: Gameboy Advance is Nintendo's first horizontal handheld console which is released in 2000.  This commercial that you are watching presents the custom reissue with screen backlight, crisp contrast, and a brand new circuit board. This 2021 version comes with four color choices; baby blue, green, red and white.  Pok√©mon Emerald is the game featured.  Alongside the renders, animations and the production design, music is also composed and produced by Can Artsan. (resolution: 1632x2040)
